string.name: new LoadVars
string.tiptext: Creates new LoadVars object

string.name: decode
string.tiptext: Converts the variable string to properties of the specified LoadVars object

string.name: load
string.tiptext: Loads variables into Flash from an URL

string.name: send
string.tiptext: Sends variables from Flash to an URL

string.name: sendAndLoad
string.tiptext: Sends variables from Flash to an URL and downloads variable results

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Converts this LoadVars object to a URL-encoded string

string.name: getBytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes loaded of variables

string.name: getBytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns expected total downloaded size of variables

string.name: addRequestHeader
string.tiptext: Adds request headers for POST actions

string.name: loaded
string.tiptext: Sets to true if load/sendAndLoad completed

string.name: contentType
string.tiptext: MIME Content Type for send/sendAndLoad

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the LoadVars object

string.name: onLoad
string.tiptext: Invoked when load/sendAndLoad completes

string.name: onData
string.tiptext: Callback to receive raw data from server

folder.name: XML
folder.tiptext: Object that allows you to work with XML documents

string.name: new XML
string.tiptext: Creates new XML object

string.name: createElement
string.tiptext: Creates a new XML element

string.name: createTextNode
string.tiptext: Creates a new XML text node

string.name: getBytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes loaded of XML

string.name: getBytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns expected total downloaded size of XML

string.name: load
string.tiptext: Loads XML into Flash from an URL

string.name: parseXML
string.tiptext: Parses XML string into this XML object

string.name: send
string.tiptext: Sends XML from Flash to an URL

string.name: sendAndLoad
string.tiptext: Sends XML from Flash to an URL and download XML results

string.name: addRequestHeader
string.tiptext: Adds request headers for POST actions

string.name: loaded
string.tiptext: Sets to true if XML load/sendAndLoad completed

string.name: status
string.tiptext: Status code returned by XML parser

string.name: xmlDecl
string.tiptext: Text of the XML document's <?xml> declaration

string.name: docTypeDecl
string.tiptext: Text of the XML document's <!DOCTYPE> declaration

string.name: ignoreWhite
string.tiptext: Set to true to ignore whitespace

string.name: contentType
string.tiptext: MIME Content Type for send/sendAndLoad

string.name: onLoad
string.tiptext: Invoked when load/sendAndLoad completes

string.name: onData
string.tiptext: Callback to receive raw data from server

folder.name: XMLNode
folder.tiptext: Internal superclass of XML object that allows you to work with XML documents

string.name: new XMLNode
string.tiptext: Creates new XMLNode object

string.name: appendChild
string.tiptext: Appends a child to an XML element

string.name: cloneNode
string.tiptext: Clones this node, and optionally children

string.name: hasChildNodes
string.tiptext: Returns true if XML element has child nodes

string.name: insertBefore
string.tiptext: Inserts a child before another child in an XML element

string.name: removeNode
string.tiptext: Removes node from the XML document hierarchy

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Converts this XMLNode object to an XML string

string.name: firstChild
string.tiptext: First child of this XMLNode

string.name: lastChild
string.tiptext: Last child of this XMLNode

string.name: nextSibling
string.tiptext: Next sibling of this XMLNode

string.name: previousSibling
string.tiptext: Previous sibling of this XMLNode

string.name: nodeValue
string.tiptext: Value (text) of this XMLNode

string.name: nodeType
string.tiptext: Type of this node (1=element, 3=text)

string.name: nodeName
string.tiptext: Name of this XMLNode element

string.name: attributes
string.tiptext: Associative array of XMLNode element's attributes

string.name: childNodes
string.tiptext: Array of XMLNode element's child nodes

string.name: parentNode
string.tiptext: Parent of this XMLNode
